info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 10:33PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Herkimer County through 1115 PM EDT... At 1032 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near McKeever, or 12 miles south of Old Forge, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Old Forge, McKeever, Nicks Lake Campground, Atwell, Wolf Lake Landing, Minnehaha, Thendara, Mountain Lodge, North Wilmurt, First Lake and Herkimer Landing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
